verses.verse: PSALM 110The LORD Gives Dominion to the King.A Psalm of David. The LORD says to my Lord: “Sit at My right hand Until I make Your enemies a footstool for Your feet.”
The LORD will stretch out Your strong scepter from Zion, saying, “Rule in the midst of Your enemies.”

Your people (Lit will be voluntary offerings) will volunteer freely on the day of Your (Or army) power; In (Or the splendor of holiness) holy splendor, from the womb of the dawn, (Or The dew of Your youth is Yours) Your youth are to You as the dew.
The LORD has sworn and will not (Lit be sorry) change His mind, “You are a priest forever According to the order of Melchizedek.”
The Lord is at Your right hand; He (Or has shattered) will shatter kings in the day of His wrath.
He will judge among the nations, He (Or has filled) will fill them with corpses, He (Or has shattered) will shatter the (Lit head over) chief men over a broad country.
He will drink from the brook by the wayside; Therefore He will lift up His head.
